scriptsComments.sb:stop: stops the supabase docker container and creates a backup
scriptsComments.sb:types: creates data types for the supabase client
scriptsComments.reset: Resets the database and runs the prisma meta scripts
scriptsComments.prisma: meta script that Runs the privileges, rls, and functions/triggers scripts
scriptsComments.prisma:realtime: enables realtime on the notification table
scriptsComments.prisma:storage: Creates a storage bucket and adds a policies to the bucket

scripts.sb:restart: npm run sb:stop && npm run sb:start
scripts.sb:types: npx supabase gen types typescript --local tb > ./types/db_types.ts
scripts.prisma:reset: npx prisma db push && npm run prisma && npx prisma db seed
scripts.prisma: npm run prisma:privileges && npm run prisma:rls && npm run prisma:triggers
